resource_data:
<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">

    <catalog>hdl</catalog>
    <entry>10494/157971</entry>
  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>
    <entry>157971</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>ILMoE</catalog>
            <entry>ILMoE2398</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Calculator for the conversion of Units of Measurement A</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Rechner für die Konvertierung der Maßeinheiten 
A</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Calculatrice pour la conversion des unités de la 
mesure A</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Calculadora para a conversão das unidades de 
medida A</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Calcolatore per la conversione delle unità della 
misura A</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Υπολογιστής για τη μετατροπή των μονάδων της μέτρησης 
Α</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Calculadora para la conversión de unidades de 
medida A</string>
          </title>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="en">A user-friendly calculator in english which is able to convert measuerments such as : weight, mass, distance and energy.Suitable for use in Junior High and High Schools.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">calculation</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">measurement</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">conversion</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Ein benutzerfreundlicher Rechner auf englisch, das
kann, umzuwandeln measuerments wie: Gewicht, Masse, Abstand und 
energy.Suitable für Gebrauch in den hohen und Juniorhigh School.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Une calculatrice conviviale en anglais tels que 
lequel peut convertir des measuerments : poids, masse, distance 
et energy.Suitable pour l'usage dans de hauts et lycées juniors.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Uma calculadora user-friendly em inglês que pode
  converter measuerments tais como: peso, massa, distância e 
energy.Suitable para o uso em High Schools elevadas e júniors.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Un calcolatore facile da usare in inglese cui può
convertire i measuerments come: peso, massa, distanza ed 
energy.Suitable per uso in alte e High Schooi minori.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ένας φιλικός προς το χρήστη υπολογιστής στα αγγλικά 
που είναι σε θέση να μετατρέψει τα measuerments όπως: 
βάρος, μάζα, απόσταση και ενέργεια κατάλληλα για τη χρήση 
στο νεώτερο υψηλό και τα γυμνάσια.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Una calculadora convivial en inglés tales como 
las cuales puede convertir measuerments: peso, masa, distancia y
energy.Suitable para el uso en High Schools altas y secundarias 
menores.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Berechnung</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Messen</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Konvertierung</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">calcul</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">mesure</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">conversion</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">cálculo</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">medida</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">conversão</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">calcolo</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">misura</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">conversione</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">υπολογισμός</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">μέτρηση</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">μετατροπή</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">cálculo</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">medida</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">conversión</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
        <lifeCycle>

          <contribute>

version:3.0

        <classification>
